properties.areaDesc: Teller County/Rampart Range above 7500fT/Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Northern El Paso County/Monument Ridge/Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 5:50AM MST until February 11 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches across Northern El Paso county while the east slope of
the Rampart Range and east slope of Pikes Peak could see 3 to
6 inches. 2 to 4 inches expected across the remainder of
Teller county.

* WHERE...Northern El Paso county, far Western El Paso county
and Teller county.

* WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 2 AM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 AM MST TUESDAY
